name: Attack 2
description: End your turn without drawing a card. Force the next player to take two turns.

name: Beard Cat
description: This is a cat card and is powerless on its own. Play two beard cat as pair to steal. A random card from another player.

name: Defuse
description: Put your last drawn card back into the deck

name: Exploding Kitchen
description: Show this card immediately.

name: Favor
description: One player must give you a card of their choice.

name: Nope
description: Stop the action of another player. You can play this at any tiem

name: See-The-Future-3
description: Privately view the top three cards of the deck.

name: Shuffle
description: Shuffle the drawn pile.

name: Skip
description: End your turn without drawing a card.

name: Barking Kitten
description: When played, if anyone has another barking kitten they explode (or defuse). Otherwise keep it in front of you, and it becomes a target when another one id played.

name: Alter the future 3
description: Privately view and rearrange the top three cards of the draw pile. Play at any time.

name: Bury
description: End your turn by secretly putting the next card you drawback into the draw pile as if you had defused it.

name: Ill-Take-That
description: Put this card in front of another player to steal the next card they draw from the draw pile.

name: Personal Attack 3
description: Take three turns in a row.

name: Pot Luck
description: Starting with you, and going in the direction of play around the table, each player puts a card on top of the draw pile.

name: Share the Future 3
description: View and rearrange the top three cards in the draw pile, then show the cards to the next player.

name: Tower of Power
description: Anytime someone steals from you, they blindly draw from the top of the tower when you like, take a card from the tower and shuffle the rest into the draw pile.

name: Super Skip
description: End your turn wihtout drawing a card. If you're supposed to take multiple turns, end them all.

name: Armageddon
description: Trigger the armageddon. Afterwards, end your turn.Can only be played if godcat is on the playmat.

name: Devilcat
description: Explode if you get devilcat in the armageddon. You must discard a defuse or explode. Then put it back on the playmat.

name: Godcat
description: Play as any card in the game. Except a nope. After playing godcat. Put it back on the playmat.

name: Raising Heck
description: Draw the bottom card from the draw pile. Look at it, and either keep it or put it on the top of the draw pile. This ends your turns.

name: Reveal The Future 3
description: Show everyone the top three cards.

name: Targeted Attack 2
description: End your turn without drawing a card. Force the next player to take two turns. Play continues from that player.

name: Alter the Future 3
description: Privately view and rearrange the top three cards of the draw pile.

name: Draw from the Bottom
description: End your turn by drawing the card at the bottom of the draw pile.

name: Feral Cat
description: Use as any cat card.

name: Imploding Kitten
description: When drawn face down, put back in the deck face up, without using a defuse. When drawn face up, explode immediately this card cannot be defused.

name: Reverse
description: Reverse the order of play and end your turn without drawing a card.

name: Alter the future 3 1
description: Privately view and rearrange the top three cards of the draw pile. Play at any time.

name: Alter the future 3 2
description: Privately view and rearrange the top three cards of the draw pile

name: Catomic Bomb
description: remove the exploding kittensfrom the deck. Shuffle the deck. Put all those kittens face down on top. Your turn ends after playing this card.

name: Garbage Collection
description: Every player ( includind the one who player this card ) must choose one card to shuffle into the draw pile.

name: Mark
description: Choose a player and randomly pick one of their cards. They must keeo that card facing outward in their hand until it is played or stolen.

name: See The Future 5
description: Privately view the top five cards of the deck.

name: Streaking Kitten
description: Keep this card a secret. As long as it 's in your hand may draw and secretly hold one exploding kitten without blowing up.

name: Super Skip
description: End your turn without drawing a card. If you're supposed to take multiple turns, end them all.

name: Swap Top and Bottom
description: Swap the top and bottom cards of the draw pile.

name: Curse of the Cat Butt
description: Choose a player to be 'blind'. They must shuffle and keep their cards face down until they draw a card.

name: Alter the Future 5
description: Privately view and rearrange the top five cards of the draw pile.

name: Attack Of The Dead
description: Do not draw any cards. Force the next player to take three turns for each dead player.

name: Clairvoyance
description: Use when someone plays a zomie kitten. You get to watch where thay secretly put the exploding kitten(s). Play at any time.

name: Clone
description: When you play this card, it becomes whatever card it beneath it.

name: Dig Deeper
description: Draw a card, look at it and then either keep it, or draw the next card ( which you must keep ) and put the first card face down on top of the draw pile.

name: Feed The Dead
description: Pick a dead player. All living players ( except you ) must choose one card from their hand to give to them. Play at any time.

name: Grave Robber
description: All dead players with card must choose one card from their hand to shuffle into the draw pile.

name: Zombie Kitten
description: Instead of exploding, secretly put an exploding kitten back into the draw pile, and bring a dead player back to life.
